results.title: Oral simvastatin combined with narrowband UVB for the treatment of psoriasis: A randomized controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Accordingly, @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ are known to have anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effects by inhibiting @<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@ and lymphocyte function.

citations.NLM: Al Salman M, Ghiasi M, Farid AS, Taraz M, Azizpour A, Mahmoudi H. Oral simvastatin combined with narrowband UVB for the treatment of psoriasis: A randomized controlled trial. Dermatol Ther. 2021 Sep;34(5):e15075. PMID: 34327798

results.title: Effects of Curcuma comosa on the expression of atherosclerosis-related cytokine genes in rabbits fed a high-cholesterol diet.
results.text_hl: In contrast, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly increased the @GENE_MCP_1 @GENE_100009115 @@@MCP-1@@@ and @GENE_TNF @GENE_100009088 @@@TNF-alpha@@@ expressions and serum ALT level, without affecting the expression of anti-@<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@.

citations.NLM: Charoenwanthanang P, Lawanprasert S, Phivthong-Ngam L, Piyachaturawat P, Sanvarinda Y, Porntadavity S. Effects of Curcuma comosa on the expression of atherosclerosis-related cytokine genes in rabbits fed a high-cholesterol diet. J Ethnopharmacol. 2011 Apr 12;134(3):608-13. PMID: 21232590

results.title: Exploring simvastatin, an antihyperlipidemic drug, as a potential topical antibacterial agent
results.text_hl: As shown in Fig. 5b, topical application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (1 and 3%) significantly reduced all tested @<m>DISEASE_Cytokine_Release_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080424 @@@inflammatory cytokines@@@.

citations.NLM: Thangamani S, Mohammad H, Abushahba MF, Hamed MI, Sobreira TJ, Hedrick VE, Paul LN, Seleem MN. Exploring simvastatin, an antihyperlipidemic drug, as a potential topical antibacterial agent Sci Rep. 2015 Nov 10;5():16407. PMID: 26553420
